markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Titan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1904)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Only the powerful and foolish would raise the bones of a mighty [titan](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=205) or similarly gargantuan creature as a skeleton. Skilled practitioners see this as a waste of a powerful body and imbue them with air walking magic based on those of titans, while the wise know it's nearly impossible to control such a colossus and that it's just as likely to crush its creator underneath its mighty foot as it is to smite their foes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 31

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeleton_Titan.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Skeletal Titan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1904)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 149</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 210
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 10, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10, piercing 15, slashing 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mountain sword +26 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+13 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+13 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +26 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+13 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bone +24 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d10+13 plus bone debris

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 31
- **Constant (7th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Bone Debris**   The bones a skeletal titan throws are large enough to clutter the battlefield. When the skeletal titan hits a creature with a bone attack, the projectile becomes difficult terrain in the square the creature occupies (or, if the creature occupies more than one square, one square it occupies of the titan's choice). If the titan misses with a bone attack, instead a random square adjacent to the creature becomes difficult terrain.

**Mountain Slam** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The skeletal titan slams its mountain sword into the ground. The shock wave reverberates, dealing mountain sword damage to all creatures in a 20- foot line (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Those who fail are also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Huge or smaller, foot, DC 34

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Skeletal Titan
